name: Ardaco, a.s.
goal: Ardaco translates its unique technologies into outstanding solutions and services in the area of communication and secure content management, personal identity and privacy, bringing a value to people and business worldwide, enabling their visions and goals.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Research programme H2020
Policy and research in security
SMEs
Space
